notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: Aierken Sidike (Corresponding author): Monitored the experimental process, Improved the academic quality of manuscripts, corrected academic errors in the manuscript. Dilare Halmurat (First author): Did all the experiments, Measured all the data. wrote the main manuscript text. Taximaiti Yusufu (Second author): Improved manuscript English grammar Qing-ling Wang: Lab assistant. Jiuyang He: Correct the mistakes in the experiment. All authors reviewed the manuscript.
